entry.title: v8.0.0
entry.summary: This is the first update of Wasmbox. Wasmbox is very new, so it is likely you will encounter bugs, awkward APIs or missing features. Please direct feedback to or the .
entry.content:
This is the first update of Wasmbox. Wasmbox is very new, so it is likely you will encounter bugs, awkward APIs or missing features. Please direct feedback to Discord or the Issue Tracker.

What Happened to Version 2.0.0 -> 7.0.0?​

The previous version of Wasmbox was 1.0.0 and this is version 8.0.0. This is because we are adopting the same version/release scheme as Wasmtime. Each month Wasmtime releases a new major version, Wasmbox will then be updated to use that version and will use the same major version number.

Features 🚀​

  • Wasmtime v8.0.0
  • Wasmtime-dotnet v8.0.0
    • Caching Function objects
    • Caching Function wrappers
    • Caching Global objects
    • Caching Global wrappers
    • Caching Memory objects

Bugfixes 🐛​

  • None.

entry.title: v1.0.0
entry.summary: The first release of Wasmbox! Since this is the very first release it is likely you will encounter bugs, awkward APIs or missing features. Please direct feedback to or the .
entry.content:
The first release of Wasmbox! Since this is the very first release it is likely you will encounter bugs, awkward APIs or missing features. Please direct feedback to Discord or the Issue Tracker.

Features 🚀​

  • Wasmtime based WASM runtime for Unity.
  • Custom WASI implementation.
  • Optimising import pipeline.
  • Unity Job System compatible.

Bugfixes 🐛​

  • None.
